history.text: I really like Robert Downey Jr.
Yes he's a really great actor in "The Avengers." I think Iron Man was my favorite character!
I can't believe it is the 6th film!
I loved each of the films. But I really felt the way they mixed the character together was amazing in this one!
I completely agree.  Joss Whedon is an awesome director!
Yes he was! Do you think Mark Ruffalo played both parts of the Hulk character very well?
I definitely liked his Bruce Banner more than his Hulk but I think he did a great job.
His transformation between the characters was one of my favorite parts. Do you think Robert Downey Jr. played well with the others or was he trying to steal the spotlight at times?
I think that just by being himself, he naturally stole the spotlight sometimes with his sarcastic wit.
That is very true. Do you think the director was able to split the spotlight among all the superheros equally or do you feel like it focused on certain ones a bit too much?
I think it was split as good as it could be with as many characters as there were in it. Do you think the length of the movie was good or should it have been longer/shorter?

I felt that it was pretty much the perfect length! There were so many great action scenes in it! My favorite was when Phil accidentally activates the Tesseract and opens the wormhole and suddenly Loki gets to Earth! What's your favorite scene?
Absolutely any part with Loki in it is my favorite!
Loki was a great character! I liked how he was able to enslave the agents into helping him.
I love that it is an action movie with so many emotions in it.
Yes it did feel emotional at times. When the team first arrived at the research facility during the evacuation I really felt for the characters.
Coulson's death was the worst.  :(
Yeah that's true. I thought when Loki was first given the army to take over Earth with it was going to get bad fast.
I always forget that Walt Disney Studios makes these movies, they have really expanded their magical horizons.
How did you feel when the team wasn't able to decide how to best handle the situation with Loki?
I don't like when they argue but I guess it's what would realistically happen when you get a bunch of superheroes together.  I felt bad for Thor.
Any group together always starts arguing about everything. Yeah Thor and Hulk both had it rough there.
There is just no stopping the Hulk.  When he saved Iron Man.....that was awesome!
Yes that was great! I loved when they all teamed up again in order to stop the wormhole.
I love when they all work together. Nick Fury's crew is unbeatable!

That's true. I loved how Iron Man handled the missile completely
 by himself.
Yes! The most selfish of them all acted so selfless. He was ready to sacrifice himself to save everyone!
True. I did like that final save of Iron Man by the Hulk as well. I thought it was pretty unexpected.
